message: Let's start fair.  I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Hope we can agree on this!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share.  Let's split it 70/30.  This is my final offer before inflation makes the money worth even less.
I'm not willing to give you 70%. I'll give you 50% and take 50%, but this is my final offer.
